definition: the Vatican/variant of 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1]
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

sentences.english: The Vatican released the letter this week.
sentences.chinese: 梵帝岡這周公布了這封信的內容。

sentences.english: The group enjoyed the full endorsement and blessing of the Vatican.
sentences.chinese: 天主事工會得到了梵帝岡的完全認可和恩准。

sentences.english: One complete copy of Against Celsus survives, at the Vatican.
sentences.chinese: 至今在梵帝岡尚存有一份完整的《抗克理索》。

sentences.english: Twenty-four hours later, he had almost lost his life inside Vatican City.
sentences.chinese: 二十四小時後，他險些在梵帝岡城喪了命。
